items.title: 5 Leadership Lessons from ‘Professor Messi’
items.description: The Major League Soccer champion just taught a masterclass that can benefit leaders in every industry.

items.title: American Airlines Just Added a Big New Restriction to Its Frequent Flyer Miles
items.description: Flyers in these seats will be left with one less perk.

items.title: 3 Steps to Turn Your Out-of-Office Reply Into a Leadership Signal
items.description: An out-of-office message might seem small, but it can be a powerful way to reinforce your personal brand.

items.title: When Executives Pontificate, Meetings Flatline
items.description: Pontification isn’t leadership. It’s just very expensive noise.

items.title: Ethics: My Direct Report and Friend Wants PTO When We’re Understaffed. What Should I Say?
items.description: A leader has to walk the line between boss and friend in this week’s Ethics column.
